name: Xequon
description:
Xequon is a multiplayer third person online shooter game where the core mechanic is that you can change your own gravity, each hero has abilities and they have their own stats (health ,speed, armor, distance to use the "gravity power").

Right now this game is in hiatus, this version is outdated so the online feature isn't working, but you can play with your friends in LAN! (remember that the host probably has to disable the firewall)

Controls

WASD: Move

F: change gravity

Space bar: Jump

Shift: Use Ability 1

Control: Use Ability 2

Left mouse click: Shoot or attack

Right mouse click: Zoom/Aim or use secondary accesory

Mouse Wheel: Use grenade

If you want to keep us working on this project consider supporting us on Patreon
